# Pendle Imports

These are minimal imports from the Pendle [repo at commit \#647c67ce](https://github.com/pendle-finance/pendle-core-v2-public/tree/647c67ce33d3dc702d48ee6a5fd1b81e83e1ef54/contracts)

If any new router functions are required in future, cherry pick from the relevant interface.

submodules & remappings were not used to avoid large recursive libraries.
